data.title: Victor Hugo Works, Complete or Set, Used
data.meta_description: LEATHER Antique Library Set; VICTOR HUGO's Works! Robert Louis Stevenson Binding and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
THE COMPLETE WORKS OF VICTOR HUGO. The famous Author of The Hunchback of Notre Dame, Les Miserables, etc. He is considered one of the greatest authors ever. Complete in 10 volumes. EDITION DELUXE. Limited Edition. THE COMPLETE WORKS OF VICTOR HUGO! The famous author of: THE HUNCHBACK OF NOTRE DAME and LES MISERABLES. Edition De Luxe. Illustrated with plates! With a Life of Hugo. Bound in the original leather bindings. Ornate gilded spine. Top edge gilded. Edition Deluxe. Wide margins. These measure 8 1/2 inches tall. Complete in 10 volumes. Printed in English. The Nottingham Society, New York, Philadelphia, Chicago. No printed Date. Circa 1895. Condition: Excellent condition for such an old set. Bound in the original leather bindings. There is some chipping and abrasion as is shown in the pictures, there is some abrasion in some hinge areas but not starting. Hinges are attached. The text blocks could be described as a little loose but solid. Some of the micro chipping might come off but the general spines and hinges are intact. Internally this set is very fresh bright clean unread and uncut pages. This would make an excellent gift and/or addition to any library. Antiquarian books make a great investment, are only going up in value, and are sure to increase the aura of any room or office! Internally very fresh and well-preserved. Hinges attached. An excellent collection of Hugo's works. Includes a General Introduction and Clerical Note by Robert Louis Stevenson. Each volume contains a frontis protected by tissue and several illustrations. Titles: Vol. I THE HUNCHBACK OF NOTRE DAME / Last Days of a Condemned Vol. II LES MISERABLES Book 1 and 2 Vol. III Les Miserables Book 3 and 4 Vol. IV Les Miserables Book 5 / Hans of Iceland Vol. V Toilers of the Sea / Bug Jargal Vol. VI The Man Who Laughs / Claude Gueux Vol. VII Ninety-Three / Thing Seen Essays Vol. VIII The History of a Crime / Napoleon the Little Vol. IX Poems and Dramas Vol. X Shakespeare / Life of Hugo. Complete in 10-volumes. This would make an excellent gift and/or addition to any library. Antiquarian books make a great investment, are only going up in value, and are sure to increase the aura of any room or office! With a general Introduction by ROBERT LOUIS STEVENSON ( famous author of Treasure Island). No printed date, printed the turn of the 20th century, so roughly 1900. Circa 1890 - 1900ish. Hugo is the famous author of The Hunchback of Notre Dame, Les Miserables, et. al. _______________________~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ This would make an excellent gift and/or addition to any library. Antiquarian books make a great investment, are only going up in value, and are sure to increase the aura of any room or office! We will pack very securely to ensure safe arrival at your doorstep. All books are individually wrapped and professionally padded. We double wrap and will leave plenty of space between this purchase and the walls of the box. We fill this space with plenty of padding.Customer Service is important to me. A full refund is offered, if the item is not as described. My goal is complete customer satisfaction. Please contact me with any questions. This set should ship out within 48 hours, and each volume will be individually wrapped and protected for shipping. This set will only ship via UPS or USPS Priority Mail. Media Mail is not offered for the protection of these books. I will ship internationally via USPS Priority Mail, which may take a couple weeks to arrive, This set is priced to sell. #3768ap.

THE COMPLETE WORKS OF VICTOR HUGO. The famous Author of The Hunchback of Notre Dame, Les Miserables, etc. Complete in 24 volumes. No date printed on the title page, printed circa 1890. This set is well over 100 years old! Bound in the highest quality leather bindings! Complete in 24 volumes. THE COMPLETE WORKS OF VICTOR HUGO! The famous author of: THE HUNCHBACK OF NOTRE DAME and LES MISERABLES. Printed in English. Bound in high quality, gilded, moroccan-leather bindings. Marbled boards and end-papers. Gilded lettering and thick raised hubs on spine. With red, floral, inlaid, leather labels. Top edge gilded. Illustrated. Approximately 7.5 inches tall. Complete in 24-volumes with all of Hugo's Works. Illustrated Cabinet Edition Dana Estes & Company, Boston. No Date. Circa 1890. CONDITION: This set is complete in 24 volumes. Excellent condition and extremely well preserved. All hinges strongly attached. The leather is very well-preserved. Printed on high quality paper that is still fresh and bright. Appears unread. Text blocks are very tight and try to close when opened. Hinges all strongly attached but are all rubbed. There is some general rubbing/wear, small micro chips at extremities, the largest chip at the base of the final volume shown in the pictures. Spines seemed slightly dry, and should be treated with linseed oil, recommended to be done every 10 or 20 years. About free of any foxing. Elaborate early bookplate featuring safari scene. No writing or previous signs of ownership. A gorgeous and complete set. A superb collection of Hugo's complete works, together with a Life of Hugo. Titles: Les Miserables I Les Miserables II Les Miserables III Les Miserables IV Les Miserables V Notre Dame I Notre Dame II Man Who Laughs I Man Who Laughs II History of a Crime I History of a Crime II Ninety-Three I Ninety-Three II The Rhine Hans of Iceland / Last Days of a Condemned Toilers of the Sea Poems I - II Poems III Dramas I Dramas II Dramas III Dramas IV Things Seen / Essays The Memorial Life of Victor Hugo, by Contemporary Writers Set is complete in 24 volumes. This set would make a great gift and/or addition to any library. Illustrated with plates! With a Life of Hugo. Bound in the original leather bindings. Ornate gilded spine. Top edge gilded.
